name: Some Sums (Haidouk)
description:
Step in the fantasy world of cups that adore numbers. In this puzzle-arcade game you just drag a cup left and right to collect the right numbers and make the required sums. Keep an eye on the timer and you should be fine.

Features:
Campaign Mode: includes 17 levels of increasing difficulty mixed with level obstacles.

  • Endless Score Mode: you receive points for each sum you make. The game only stops when you run out of time.
  • Power-ups: Collect them to get temporary boosts (extra-time, slow-down numbers, destroy bad numbers) and also, custom-made beats for each power-up.
  • Bonus stages: Win a level to enter the bonus stage and collect coins. The better you play the more coins are spawned. Use coins to buy items in the game shop.
  • In-game Shop: Unlock cute animated cups and dreamy game backgrounds using coins. You can even disable Ads with coins.
  • 4 difficulty stages: From Novice to Pro, Expert, or Legend, you will become better and better at adding numbers under the pressure of time. The game keeps getting more and more fun and challenging to the point where completing the last levels will be insanely rewarding!
  • Leaderboard: Prove your math prowess in the endless Score Mode and check your high score against other players.

Either you want to practice number addition or just feel good about your math skills and want to put them to test, this is one of the most fun experiences of making sums. Whether you're at home, at work, or at school, this game is a great time-killer and will most certainly tickle your brain.
